game.name: Vagrant Hearts 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The heroes are back! This is the direct sequel to the 16-bit style RPG hit "Vagrant Hearts"! Find out what happens to Scarllet and her friends in this exciting adventure full of twists and epicness.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The heroes are back! This is the direct sequel to the 16-bit style RPG hit "Vagrant Hearts"! Find out what happens to Scarllet and her friends in this exciting adventure full of twists and epicness.

reviewHighlights.text: This is a short sequel to Vagrant Hears. The game can be a tiny bit buggy, so save often. It ends in a cliffhanger suggesting a sequel might be coming...
